 * Hook that alerts clicks outside of the passed ref
 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function useOutsideAlerter(ref,setSignInFormPopUp,setSignUpFormPopUp,setOpacity,setPosition){useEffect(function(){/**
